etymology.description: 中 (middle; central) + 国/國 (state; nation) = the central state (‘Middle Kingdom’).
etymology.interpretation: Names the central states in the classical Sino-centric worldview; in modern usage, the country of China or the Chinese nation.
etymology.simplification: 國 was simplified to 国 by replacing the complex interior 或 with the simpler 玉/王 component to reduce strokes; 中 is unchanged.

examples.chinese: 我在中国工作(我在中國工作)。
中国历史很长(中國歷史很長)，文化多样(文化多樣)。
examples.pinyin: Zhōngguó lìshǐ hěn cháng, wénhuà duōyàng.
examples.english: China’s history is long, and its culture is diverse.

examples.chinese: 他们热爱中国(他們熱愛中國)。
